placeholderImages.description: A diverse group of students collaborating over a laptop in a modern library.
A student smiling confidently, looking towards the future in a bright, outdoor setting.
An abstract visualization of a digital career path with glowing nodes and connections.
A close-up of a student using a tablet to explore a college directory, with a campus in the background.
A split screen showing a student studying and a professional working in their field, representing the journey.
